TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool TaskCancelledCheck(object sender, Guid taskId, SPWorkflowTaskProperties creationProperties, out string outcome);
.class public auto ansi sealed TaskCancelledCheck extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function TaskCancelledCheck(sender As Object, taskId As Guid, creationProperties As SPWorkflowTaskProperties, ByRef outcome As String) As Boolean
public delegate bool TaskCancelledCheck(System::Object ^ sender, Guid taskId, SPWorkflowTaskProperties ^ creationProperties, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % outcome);

Docs.param: The GUID of the workflow task identifier (ID).
An object that contains the properties of the workflow task at the time of its creation.
Docs.summary: A delegate that is used to determine whether a workflow task has been cancelled.
Docs.returns: A Boolean value that indicates whether or not the workflow task has been cancelled.
